body_html: Hi @tfboyd, I tried to use your patches, but after the first build step, there is no "external/eigen_archive" folder at all. It means the command "cd -P bazel-out/../../../external/eigen_archive" failed. So when this folder is generated?
body_text: Hi @tfboyd, I tried to use your patches, but after the first build step, there is no "external/eigen_archive" folder at all. It means the command "cd -P bazel-out/../../../external/eigen_archive" failed. So when this folder is generated?
body: Hi @tfboyd, I tried to use your patches, but after the first build step, there is no "external/eigen_archive" folder at all. It means the command "cd -P bazel-out/../../../external/eigen_archive" failed. So when this folder is generated?
